# spectrocloud_appliance (Resource)

  A resource for creating and managing appliances for Edge Native cluster provisioning.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "spectrocloud_appliance" "appliance" {
  uid = "test-dec9"
  tags = {
    "name" = "appliance_name"
  }
  wait = true
}
```
